metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14463 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in libmodbus before 3.0.7 and 3.1.x before 3.1.5.There is an out-of-bounds read for the MODBUS_FC_WRITE_MULTIPLE_REGISTERScase, aka VD-1301.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14463` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmodbus5 - 3.0.6-2+deb9u1build0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmodbus package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.0.6-2+deb9u1build0.18.04.1').
